items.title: Colts’ former All-Pro LB Shaquille Leonard to retire as member of franchise during halftime of Raiders game

Originally a 2018 2nd […]

items.title: Colts to honor Shaq Leonard at halftime as former linebacker announces retirement
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS -- "The Maniac" will have his moment. Shaquille Leonard, the dynamic linebacker drafted by Indianapolis in 2018, plans to retire as member of the Colts. The six-year veteran former All-Pro spent the bulk of his career with the Horseshoe. Injuries derailed his promising career. The team will honor him during Sunday's game against the [...]

items.title: Your favorite quarterback's favorite quarterback: Colts enter Week 4 with healthy respect for Los Angeles Rams QB Matthew Stafford
